name: desktop-shortcuts
description: Check if Chrome allows to create applications shortcuts from websites
pre_condition: Have Google Chrome started with a website displayed

steps.description: Click on the Tools button
steps.expected: A drop-down menu opens

steps.description: Select "Tools"
steps.expected: A drop-left menu opens

steps.description: Click on "Create Application Shortcuts..."
steps.expected: A "Create Application Shortcuts" window appears

steps.description: in the window, check "Desktop" and "Applications menu"
Click on "Create"
steps.expected: A new Chrome window starts with your website displayed in a application window  (without Chrome features) and the shortcut of the corresponding application is available in the Desktop and in the Application menu

author: elebideau

name: install-app
description: Install an applcation provided by Chrome Web Store
pre_condition: Have a google account and have Chrome started with the new tab page displayed

steps.description: Click on "Chrome Web Store"
steps.expected: The Chrome Web Store page appears

steps.description: Select any application and Click on "Add to Chrome"
steps.expected: A "Confirm New App" window appears

steps.description: Click on "Add"
steps.expected: A "New tab" page appears with the newly application installed in Chrome visible

author: elebideau

name: web-app-homescreen-application-mode
objective: chrome web applications icons appears in homescreen application mode
description: Check if when installed, a chrome application is visible in the homescreen application mode
pre_condition: Have installed an application from Chrom Web Store and have the Desktop in foreground

steps.description: Click on the top left "Applications" button
steps.expected: The homescreen application mode is displayed

steps.description: Check the Applications installed
steps.expected: A high-resolution icon for the application installed from Chrome Web Store is visible

author: elebideau

name: web-app-homescreen
objective: chrome web applications icons appears on homescreen
description: Check if when installed, a chrome application is visible on the homescreen
pre_condition: Have installed an application from Chrom Web Store and have the Desktop in foreground

steps.description: Check the desktop
steps.expected: A high-resolution icon for the application must be visible

author: elebideau

name: web-app-homescreen-settings
objective: chrome web applications icons appears in homescreen settings
description: Check if when installed, a chrome application is visible in the homescreen settings
pre_condition: Have installed an application from Chrom Web Store and have the Desktop in foreground

steps.description: Click on the top right "user" button
steps.expected: A drop-down menu opens

steps.description: Click on "Settings"
steps.expected: The Settings window appears

steps.description: Click on "Home Screen Settings"
steps.expected: The Home Screen Settings window appears and a high-resolution icon for the application installed from Chrome Web Store is visible in the Home screen Apps

author: elebideau

name: use-web-app-homescreen-application-mode
objective: launch a web application from homescreen application mode
description: Check if an application installed from Chrome Web Store can launched and use from the homescreen application mode
pre_condition: Have installed an application from Chrome Web Store and be located and have homescreen application mode opened

steps.description: In the homescreen application mode, click on the Google application installed icon
steps.expected: The application starts in a restricted Chrome browser application window and is usable

name: use-web-app-homescreen
objective: launch a web application from the homescreen
description: Check if an application installed from Chrome Web Store can launched and use from the homescreen
pre_condition: Have installed an application from Chrom Web Store and have the Desktop in foreground

steps.description: On the homescreen, click on the Google application installed icon
steps.expected: The application starts in a restricted Chrome browser application window and is usable

author: elebideau

name: use-web-app-homescreen-settings
objective: launch a web application from the homescreen-settings
description: Check if an application installed from Chrome Web Store can launched and use from the homescreen settings
pre_condition: Have installed an application from Chrome Web Store and be located and have homescreen Settings window opened

name: switch-web-app
objective: switch between several chrome web applications
description: Check if the system recognize Chrome installed applications as different programs and allows to switch between them like for other programs installed on the system
pre_condition: Have installed several Chrome applications and have them started in application mode

steps.description: Press Alt+Tab to switch between the applications
steps.expected: The switch mode displays all Chrome applications like different entities and allows to switch between them

author: elebideau

name: gmail-offline
description: Check if the Gmail application can be started and used in offline mode

steps.description: Open the Gmail offline application from Chrome or from the homescreen application mode
steps.expected: Gmail offline starts and correctly displays the messages and allows to write emails and to displays all emails existing

author: elebideau

name: google-drive-docs
description: Check the good behaviour of google-drive/docs

steps.description: In the google applications page, click on "Docs"
steps.expected: The "Docs" page appears

steps.description: In the "Docs" page type some keyboard letters on the blank document
steps.expected: The letters are displayed

steps.description: Close the "Docs" tab
Click again on the "new tab" button
steps.expected: a new tab is opened and the google applications page appears

steps.description: In the google applications page, click on "Google Drive"
steps.expected: The "Google Drive" page appears with the previously edited document listed

steps.description: Click on the document
steps.expected: The "Docs" page is displayed and what has been typed is displayed

steps.description: Close the "Docs" tab
In the "Google Drive" tab, mark the document and click on the "Delete" button
steps.expected: The document has been moved into the trash section

author: elebideau

name: google-drive-offline
description: Check if Google Drive can be used offline
pre_condition: Have Activate the offline mode in Google Drive

steps.description: Check that offline mode is activated
Run Google Drive from Chrome or from the homescreen application mode
steps.expected: Google Drive starts correctly and allows to open and edit the listed documents

author: elebideau

name: uninstall-web-app
description: Check if Chrome allows to uninstall applications installed by Chrome Web Store
pre_condition: Have Chrome applications installed and have Google Chrome started

steps.description: Go on the "new tab" page in Chrome to see all install applications listed
Right-click on the application to uninstall
steps.expected: A drop-down menu opens

steps.description: Click on "Remove from Chrome"
steps.expected: The application is successfully uninstalled and disappeared from the Chrome new tab page

author: elebideau

name: uninstalled-web-app-homescreen-application-mode
objective: uninstalled chrome web application disappeared from the homescreen application mode
description: Check if Chrome uninstalled applications have correctly disappeared from the homescreen application mode
pre_condition: Have uninstalled a chrome application in the chrome new tab page and be located on the Desktop

steps.description: Click on the top left "Applications" button
steps.expected: The homescreen application mode is displayed

steps.description: Check the Applications installed
steps.expected: The chrome application icon does not appear in the application list because it has been correctly uninstalled

author: elebideau

name: uninstalled-web-app-homescreen
objective: uninstalled chrome web application disappeared from the homescreen
description: Check if Chrome uninstalled applications have correctly disappeared from the homescreen
pre_condition: Have uninstalled a chrome application in the chrome new tab page and be located on the Desktop

steps.description: Check the desktop
steps.expected: The application must not be visible because it has been correctly uninstalled

author: elebideau

name: uninstalled-web-app-homescreen-settings
objective: uninstalled chrome web application disappeared from the homescreen settings
description: Check if Chrome uninstalled applications have correctly disappeared from the homescreen settings
pre_condition: Have uninstalled a chrome application in the chrome new tab page and be located on the Desktop

steps.description: Click on the top right "user" button
steps.expected: A drop-down menu opens

steps.description: Click on "Settings"
steps.expected: The Settings window appears

steps.description: Click on "Home Screen Settings"
steps.expected: The Home Screen Settings window appears and the application installed from Chrome Web Store is not visible in the Home screen Apps because it has been correctly uninstalled

author: elebideau
